description: From a young age, I was fascinated by technology and how computers work. The magic of turning ideas into working programs captured my imagination. This curiosity led me to start experimenting with code, building small projects, and learning the fundamentals of computer science that would shape my career path.

I'm currently pursuing Computer Engineering, where I've dived deep into software development, machine learning, and web technologies. I've worked on diverse projects ranging from Java applications to ML models, gaining hands-on experience with real-world problems. I actively participate in coding challenges, build side projects, and continuously expand my technical skillset through practical learning.

I'm a passionate full-stack developer and machine learning enthusiast with experience in building production-ready applications. From creating AI-powered document processing tools to developing publisher recommendation systems, I love solving complex problems with elegant solutions. I'm always exploring new technologies, contributing to open source, and building projects that make a real impact. Let's create something amazing together!
